Whetstone.NAME: Tocilo
Whetstone.FLAVOR: "Telo nikad ne pobeđuje čelik." - Kublaj Veliki

NeowsBlessing.NAME: Njovin plač
DESCRIPTIONS: Neprijatelji u prve #btri borbe imaju jedan ž. p.

White Beast Statue.NAME: Statua bele zveri
White Beast Statue.FLAVOR: Bela statuica stvorenja koje nikada ranije nisi video.
DESCRIPTIONS: Napici se sada uvek pojavljuju kao deo plena posle borbe.

Symbiotic Virus.NAME: Symbiotic Virus
Symbiotic Virus.FLAVOR: A little bit of bad can do a lot of good...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yChannel #b1 #yDark.

Nuclear Battery.NAME: Nuclear Battery
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yChannel #b1 #yPlasma.

Cables.NAME: Zlatni kablovi
Cables.FLAVOR: "Interesantno! Čak su i automatoni podložni placebu." - Ranuid
DESCRIPTIONS: Tvoja glavna sfera izvršava svoju pasivnu sposobnost još jedan dodatni put.

Emotion Chip.NAME: Emotion Chip
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, if you took any damage last turn, trigger the passive ability of all your Orbs.

Runic Capacitor.NAME: Runski kondenzator
DESCRIPTIONS: Započni svaku borbu sa #btri dodatna sferna polja.

DataDisk.NAME: Data Disk
DataDisk.FLAVOR: This disk contains precious data on birds and snakes.
